alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:16AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Windham, Tolland and Hartford Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 615 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glastonbury, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Periods of heavy rainfall are forecast to continue this morning and afternoon. If prolonged heavy rainfall rates continue to occur over this area, a flash flood warning may be issued. Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Manchester, East Hartford, Enfield, Southington, Glastonbury, Newington, Vernon, Windsor, Wethersfield, Mansfield, South Windsor, Farmington, Windham, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Berlin and Rocky Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
